{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10213v1", "title": "The HYDRA pion-tracker for hypernuclei studies at R3B", "summary": "The HYpernuclei-Decay at R3B Apparatus (HYDRA) tracker is a novel time
projection chamber combined with a plastic scintillator wall for timing and
trigger purposes. This detector is a low radiation length tracker dedicated to
measuring pions from the weak decay of light hypernuclei produced from ion-ion
collisions at few GeV/nucleon in the magnetic field of the large-acceptance
dipole magnet GLAD at the Reactions with Relativistic Radioactive Beams (R3B)
experiment at GSI-FAIR. In this paper, we describe the design of the detector
and provide the results of its first characterizations.", "main_category": "physics.ins-det", "categories": "physics.ins-det,nucl-ex", "published": "2025-04-14T13:29:59Z"}
